prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon that glows in the dark with vibrant blue and yellow features.
I want a cute electric-type Pokemon that has a round body and long antennae.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that uses bioluminescence to attract its prey.
Make a friendly Pokemon that lives in the ocean and has a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can illuminate dark underwater caves with its glowing features.
Design a small Pokemon that can float and has a whimsical, cheerful appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small fish and has bright, eye-catching colors.

distinctive_features: Glowing yellow bulbs at the end of the antennae
